actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To waive interest and penalties on failures to properly complete schedule D of Form 1040 for 1997.

summary.text: Prohibits any interest, penalty, addition to the tax, or additional amount from being imposed under the Internal Revenue Code on any underpayment attributable to a failure to properly complete schedule D of Form 1040 for a taxable year ending during 1997 if: (1) the return for such year is filed on or before the due date (including extensions) for filing such return; and (2) such failure is due to reasonable cause and not to willful neglect.

titles.title: To waive interest and penalties on failures to properly complete schedule D of Form 1040 for 1997.
